_sText:
To start this off. I am not the original creator of this map. Nipper is the creator of cs_darkhouse. The only credit I take is for modifying it for zombiemod.

My clans zombiemod server originally had the cs_darkhouse version on their server over a year ago. It was played a good amount but really had no good places to hide or barricade. They layout of the map it's self is actually really good for zombiemod. It just needed a few tweeks. So a few weeks ago I decided to to take the map and zombify it. Changing things into moveable objects and a few spots into good camping spots. While most the map remains like the original. A few things have changed.

=========================

- The room is now accessable.
- Areas in attic to serve as camping spots.
- Moveable props all throughout the house now!
- Some doors have been closed for zombiemod.
- Some rooms have changed size a slight bit.
- There is now access to the top of the barn.
- Moveable props in the barn.
- Move able props in the shed.
- The rock with boxes stacked up to it is now larger.
- The underground has changed a slit bit for ZM and a small room was added.
- Terrorist spawns have been moved outside behind the house.

=========================

We have ran this map on the .Zpro server and people seemed to like it so I have decided to release it here. The original map had a great layout. It just needed to be zombified a bit. Though I would like to make it clear again that I am "NOT" the original creator of this map. I just took it and made a few changes here and there for zombiemod.

Enjoy.
